arStrings.szText: Enemies hit by {c_important}Smoke Grenade{/c} take {c_number}[{SF_6}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage from you for {c_number}{SF_20}{/c} seconds.
Hitting an Elite or Boss with your {c_important}Smoke Grenade{/c} reduces its Cooldown by {c_number}{SF_11}{/c} seconds.
{c_important}Smoke Grenade{/c} now deals Poison damage and applies another {c_number}{payload:POISON_PAYLOAD}{/c} Poisoning damage over {c_number}{SF_21}{/c} seconds.
